ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I have overcome setbacks to conquer an important challenge.
Notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: New ideas and projects sometimes distract me from previous ones.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: My interests change from year to year.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: Setbacks don't discourage me.
Notes: 5 = Very much like me; 4 = Mostly like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 2 = Not much like me; 1 = Not like me at all; 9999 = I do not wish to answer this question

ElementDescription: I have been obsessed with a certain idea or project for a short time but later lost interest.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: I am a hard worker.
Notes: 5 = Very much like me; 4 = Mostly like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 2 = Not much like me; 1 = Not like me at all; 9999 = I do not wish to answer this question

ElementDescription: I often set a goal but later choose to pursue a different one.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: I have difficulty maintaining my focus on projects that take more than a few months to complete.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: I finish whatever I begin.
Notes: 5 = Very much like me; 4 = Mostly like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 2 = Not much like me; 1 = Not like me at all; 9999 = I do not wish to answer this question

ElementDescription: I have achieved a goal that took years of work.
Notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: I become interested in new pursuits every few months.
Notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

ElementDescription: I am diligent.
Notes: 5 = Very much like me; 4 = Mostly like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 2 = Not much like me; 1 = Not like me at all; 9999 = I do not wish to answer this question

ElementDescription: Grit Total score
Notes: 1=not at all gritty; 5=extremely gritty

ElementDescription: Consistency of interests
Notes: 999= missing

ElementDescription: Perseverance of effort
Notes: 999= missing

ElementDescription: Brief Grit Scale Score
Ambition Score
I aim to be the best in the world at what I do

ElementDescription: Grit Scale Score
Notes: ((6-(grit_1rev))+(grit_2)+(6-(grit_3rev))+(grit_4)+(6-(grit_5rev))+(6-(grit_6rev))+(grit_7)+(grit_8))/8
